vsParam:
Puff... I think we've almost cut down all the Autumn Treants~
The branches and leaves have piled up gradually...

Atishoo! Sorry, you two have to cut down
all the Autumn Treants...

Hmm, if I didn't get the pollinosis... I would have surrounded
those treants with the most powerful flare magic!

It's horrible! Majorum Sensei, it's so horrible!?
Don't use your flare magic, OK!?

Yeah... Forget it! Even though they're powerful,
they are not [px]'s match!
Exactly, just leave it to me!

Yeah!
Ha ha, good job. Thank you!

Huh? What did you say!?
They're unforgivable for torturing [px] who is so cute...
I'm going to use my best power to burn them to ashes!

Hold on, hold on!! It's OK!
The battle is bitter, but we've gotten through it!!

Really?
If so, I'll let it go...
Ah, I remember it. In return, I'll tell you some good news, [px].

You've known what the Autumn Treant is composed of?
It's said you can create special power... by combining them.

Yes. In fact, you need to dry them and then, dip them into
special magical liquid medicine, which is a quite complex process...

But it'll be much faster with alchemy.
Do you want to give it a try, [px]?

Oh, that's really great news!!
Hey, give it a shot! Hurry!!

Hehe, I should get going. Please keep
cutting down the Autumn Treants... Atishoo!

Haha, copy~ that~!
Majorum Sensei, do—take—care!

Use ingredients from the Autumn Treants
to synthesize intermediate material.

Start to complete quests repeatedly
to make intermediate material!
